text: ādam‌ra santatigaḷē, śaitānanu nim'ma tande tāyiyannu svargadinda hora hākisidante (hāgū) avara mēlinda avara uḍugegaḷannu kaḷacisi avara mānada bhāgagaḷannu avara munde prakaṭapaḍisidante avanu nim'mannu dārigeḍisadirali. Khaṇḍitavāgiyū, avanu mattu avana paṅgaḍadavaru, nimage avarannu nōḍalāgada kaḍeyinda, nim'mannu nōḍuttiruttāre. Nāvantu śaitānarannu, viśvāsigaḷalladavara pōṣakarāgisiddēve
